channel.title: CVE Feed for Fujidenolo Solutions Co., Ltd. -- SonicDICOM Media Viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fujidenolo Solutions Co., Ltd. -- SonicDICOM Media Viewer

item.title: CVE-2024-29734|2024-04-03T07:11:05.544Z -- Fujidenolo Solutions Co., Ltd. -- SonicDICOM Media Viewer
item.description: Uncontrolled search path element issue exists in SonicDICOM Media Viewer 2.3.2 and earlier, which may lead to insecurely loading Dynamic Link Libraries. As a result, arbitrary code may be executed with the privileges of the running application.
